data.description:
You spend your time looking for bait in the area; describe how and roll 1d6

  • 1. None, really? You do not manage to find bait, and you wear yourself out so that you do not recover Hit Points and Mind Points during this rest.

  • 2. It's Something, I guess... You find 1 Simple Bait.

  • 3-5. A respectable find! You find 3 Simple Bait.

  • 6. No way! You find 1 Unique Bait.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-rollable-tables.RollTable.EdwaC4A1eZVFUYNW]{Bait Finding}
